replies.msg: 隔離愛蛇淨係帶咗6件一隊去

“Kante, in the last match, wanted to solve the match after the first 15 minutes but in the wrong way,” Sarri said. “He lost his position. He attacked too much the other box. And I think this is not one of the best characteristics of Kante. Maybe it’s only a question of time. But Kante has to stay near to Jorginho, especially when the ball is on the other side.”
======================

Olivier Giroud, Kante’s team-mate for club and country, must have been as surprised as anyone to hear Sarri’s judgment, although he hid it well.

“I think N’Golo can play every single position in midfield,” he said. “Maybe in the manager’s mind, N’Golo is more efficient playing that position box to box. We don’t need to question his position. He just needs to adapt to what the manager wants.”

Sarri’s anger was not reserved for Kante. He had face-to-face meetings with each player earlier this week to discuss their shortcomings against Spurs and is looking for a strong reaction in Thursday night’s game, even though Chelsea have already qualified from Group L and need only a point to finish top.
